title: Freeman Explains!: The Things That Can Change, That Should Change
description: If someone claims they can singlehandedly revolutionize entire industries, you should laugh and walk away. Except if that person is one of America's top technology developers who has successfully done this very thing many times before. His work has affected the lives of everyone on theplanet, including yours! Many refer to him as an American genius. Hear for yourself.
author: Michael J. Freeman
